text:
The stcheckout task has a parameter called "label" which allows a label to be 
used to define the checkout.  There are two types of labels in star team - 
view label, and revision labels.  When a revision label is specified, the 
checkout fails.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com

text: This is fixed, as of the patch submitted with bug 14208.
creator: stevec@ignitesports.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
not exactly a duplicate, but fixes this one as well (so they say 8-).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14208 ***
